name: Srinagar
note: Central Valley city; major origin point for the exodus.

name: Anantnag
note: Valley district; significant origin area for displaced families.

name: Baramulla
note: Valley district; significant origin area for displaced families.

name: Fatehkadal
note: Neighborhood in Srinagar along the Jhelum River, near Fatehkadal Bridge; abandoned Pandit colony.

name: Habbakadal
note: Neighborhood in Srinagar along the Jhelum River, near Habbakadal Bridge; abandoned Pandit colony.

name: Soomyar
note: Neighborhood in eastern Srinagar; abandoned Pandit colony.

name: Drabiyar
note: Neighborhood in eastern Srinagar, south of Soomyar; abandoned Pandit colony.

name: Kharyar
note: Neighborhood in eastern Srinagar, south of Drabiyar; abandoned Pandit colony.

name: Maliyar
note: Neighborhood in eastern Srinagar, south of Kharyar; abandoned Pandit colony.

name: Ganpatyar
note: Neighborhood in eastern Srinagar, south of Maliyar; abandoned Pandit colony.

name: Badiyar
note: Neighborhood in Srinagar along the right bank of Jhelum River; abandoned Pandit colony.

name: Sathoo Bar-Bar Shah
note: Neighborhood in eastern Srinagar, further from the river; abandoned Pandit colony.

name: Sheetalnath
note: Neighborhood in eastern Srinagar, south of Sathoo Bar-Bar Shah; abandoned Pandit colony.

name: Kralkhud
note: Neighborhood in Srinagar on the left bank of Jhelum River, adjacent to Fatehkadal Bridge; abandoned Pandit colony.

name: Gawkadal
note: Neighborhood in southeastern Srinagar, near Dal Lake Water Channel; abandoned Pandit colony.

name: Mishriwala
note: Primary camp location in Jammu region; listed in academic research.

name: Purkhoo
note: Phase-I TRT (Temporary Relief and Transit) location in Jammu.

name: Muthi
note: Phase-I TRT (Temporary Relief and Transit) location in Jammu.

name: Nagrota
note: Phase-I TRT (Temporary Relief and Transit) location in Jammu.

name: Jagti
note: Jagti Migrant Colony; major TRT location near Nagrota.

name: Lajpat Nagar
note: Urban resettlement cluster in Delhi; camp at Krishna Market.

name: Dwarka
note: Urban resettlement cluster in Delhi; many families moved here.

name: Rohini
note: Urban resettlement cluster in Delhi; significant concentration of families.

name: Kalkaji
note: Urban resettlement cluster in Delhi; community settlement area.
